title: One For All heads back to the FGM workshop

replies.body: Doom bots or URF, i dont mind as long as one comes back because it is what defines league, dying to bots and watching each other keyboard mash
Can you bring back Doom Bots
Mate please don't, I just logged in to say that its not a good feeling to die to bots. and you dont have the human error to make fun of
how about they make everyone like lvl 5 doombots :P
Can we have a game mode that combines urf and one for all?
Aww man, I loved that game mode. Yes some games were very one sided, some champions should probably be perma banned because they are too good or too bad, but it was a fun game mode none the less.
If someone made a game exactly like league but had these gamemodes on 24/7 i think it would be better than lol
Aw I raced to be level 10 to play but only played it a few times. It was always only fun for one side. I just kept getting bad match ups like le sin against vayne, but had a few good games too.
